name: GetFacebookAdsProductActivity
description:
Retrieve product activity breakdown for a Facebook ads outreach.

This tool provides a breakdown of ecommerce product activity for a specific Facebook ads outreach campaign. It should be called when detailed analytics of product performance related to a Facebook ad outreach is needed.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Facebook ads outreach campaign to retrieve the product activity breakdown.
